definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: Welcome Olympic, deliver civilization, build up new spirit.
I am informed that Mr Lear's daughters set the fashion of ladies' driving.
sentences.chinese: 我听说李尔先生的女儿们开创了女子开车的新风尚。

sentences.english: The "fresh air lake" fills the room slowly from the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 新风从房间的底部慢慢地充满整个房间。

sentences.english: A new tide of fashion sets in.
It is conveniently to apply demand-control for fresh air with CO2 concentration.
sentences.chinese: 利用CO2浓度可以方便地实现新风量的需求控制。

sentences.english: We are going to give you a brief description of five trends that you might be interested in.
sentences.chinese: 我们将简要地介绍五种你可能感兴趣的新风尚。

sentences.english: In the year 2007, Central Fresh Air System , branded Venson entered China formally .
sentences.chinese: 2007年，闻森品牌中央新风系统正式入驻中国。

sentences.english: Especially, Literary Tales of the Tang initiated a new general mood of novel creation.
sentences.chinese: 特别是唐传奇，更是开创了一代小说创作的新风气。

sentences.english: This city is proud to display its new image to the world.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市正自豪地向世人展示它的新风貌。

sentences.english: The intake rate of fresh air for theatre air-conditioning is not consistent at present.
sentences.chinese: 影剧院空调新风量的采用值，目前极不统一。

sentences.english: Start with me, welcome oversea guests and build Shanghai new manners.
sentences.chinese: 从我做起，迎接海外来宾，树上海新风。

sentences.english: You seem to have seta new trend.
Walk into any supermarket today and you'll see a new trend.
sentences.chinese: 走进时下任何一家超市，你会看到一种新风尚。

sentences.english: The style of drawing presents a new trend under new era.
sentences.chinese: 行笔简洁轻快，酣畅淋漓，呈现了新时代下的新风尚。

sentences.english: We should initiate a new social custom.
sentences.chinese: 我们要开创社会新风尚。

sentences.english: Every Chinese citizen should be stressing civilization, and fostering new practices.
sentences.chinese: 每一个中国公民都应该讲文明，树新风。

definition: current custom/current way of doing things
to eliminate dust (i.e. filter out suspended particles)
